about_the_game:
This is a Virtual Reality Inventory-type game that allows you to explore the great ship RMS Titanic, Find your Love and save her! This is your mission, but for that, you need to find keys to open doors, swimming suit, Jackets, etc, and finally, you need to find your safety boats before the time ends. This is a High-Quality graphics game, so performance may vary according to the device capabilities, we added a graphics quality selector in this game, so you can choose your graphics quality setting according to your PC capability.

This is not a simple game to play, our Idea on this game is that user can walk around the whole Titanic ship and feel like you are in real legendary Titanic ship, and along with that play as a game to take objects, find the rose and save her in time. You can view the ice-burg hitting the titanic from the top deck after the first mission accomplished. Try this game and feel yourself in Titanic.

1: Graphics Quality selector
2: Full Visual View of ice burg collision with RMS Titanic in Virtual Reality
3: Ultra HD Graphics
4: Feel Like you are in Titanic.
5: All Virtual Reality gear support
6: Life Time experience
7: Unlock Boosters
8: New Advanced Virtual Reality technology
detailed_description:
This is a Virtual Reality Inventory-type game that allows you to explore the great ship RMS Titanic, Find your Love and save her! This is your mission, but for that, you need to find keys to open doors, swimming suit, Jackets, etc, and finally, you need to find your safety boats before the time ends. This is a High-Quality graphics game, so performance may vary according to the device capabilities, we added a graphics quality selector in this game, so you can choose your graphics quality setting according to your PC capability.

This is not a simple game to play, our Idea on this game is that user can walk around the whole Titanic ship and feel like you are in real legendary Titanic ship, and along with that play as a game to take objects, find the rose and save her in time. You can view the ice-burg hitting the titanic from the top deck after the first mission accomplished. Try this game and feel yourself in Titanic.

name: VR Titanic - Find the Rose

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 / AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon R9 290
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 / AMD Ryzen 7 or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1070 / AMD Radeon RX Vega 56 / any NVIDIA RTX cards

publishers: Saturn VR , NipsApp Gaming Software Pvt Ltd
short_description: This is a Virtual Reality Inventory-type game that allows you to explore the great ship RMS Titanic, Find your Love and save her!
